entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 08:55 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening with risk of freezing rain. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 08:55 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. POP 30%
